title: markinaz
author: markinaz
content: I wanted to share this, I am imagine most people have seen Greenpeace's hit piece on Bitcoin (paid for by Chris Larson).   I do NOT support this cause at all; however, I really like the art from Von Wong and from what I hear, he is rethinking his position on Bitcoin and it's impact to the environment.In any case, long story short, you can get a free sticker.  I requested one, as I find it an interesting free collectible that will never see the light of day!  A win/win if a pro-Bitcoiner gets one of these:https://engage.us.greenpeace.org/PRVBAQyiOk6Y03SS-dA6Dw2Again, I do NOT support the code change, but do appreciate the art and feel this whole initiative will eventually be one of the best things for people to understand Bitcoin's cooperation with alternative energy.Thanks!

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: They will never be able to change the code. Bitcoin is the most energy efficient system ever created for what it does. Gives property rights to everyone on earth, will reduce the amount of wars and take us out of this clown world once and for all.I just copped my sticker. This is going to be a funny one to look back on in 20 yearsCiao,BTCOVERFIATS

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Cool find. I’m sure this is the sort of thing that will be sought after by someone someday. For me, they lost me with the phone number requirement. I guess maybe I could try giving them a false number and see what happens. I should probably have a throwaway google number for things like this. Thanks for sharing with the class.

comments.author: markinaz
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on March 24, 2023, 04:37:44 PMCool find. I’m sure this is the sort of thing that will be sought after by someone someday. For me, they lost me with the phone number requirement. I guess maybe I could try giving them a false number and see what happens. I should probably have a throwaway google number for things like this. Thanks for sharing with the class. Phone number is optional, I left it blank.

comments.author: markinaz
comments.body: My thought is every sticker hoarded by a collector and believer of BTC avoids the chance of someone getting tricked by the propaganda.  I ordered ones for several relatives...lol

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: this sticker edition you can print out with the file below or use this file e.g. at stickermule.com to be able to order this there!https://bitcoinis.green/stickers

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: Quote from: cygan on March 25, 2023, 11:56:47 AMthis sticker edition you can print out with the file below or use this file e.g. at stickermule.com to be able to order this there!https://bitcoinis.green/stickersAw hell yeah! I'll probably Photoshop the graphic one of these days and add some other stuff to it.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Quote from: NotATether on March 25, 2023, 02:50:57 PMAw hell yeah! I'll probably Photoshop the graphic one of these days and add some other stuff to it.  Thanks Mark!   I subscribed for one just for the hell of it as I like the image....just not what it says about BTC    As for making a photoshop of this please keep me in mind would love to see what you create from it! CHeers!

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Oh, that's a crazy cool piece of art (the skull-sculpture).Here is a video in case OPs link doesn't work for you: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u0mQ7CxyICwbtw: Ridiculous idea to just change some code to reduce Bitcoins energy consumption by 99%. PoW or what exactly is this "amazing idea"?

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: After a couple months of waiting, I just received my sticker in my mailbox today

comments.author: markinaz
comments.body: Quote from: BTCOVERFIATS on June 06, 2023, 01:36:17 AMAfter a couple months of waiting, I just received my sticker in my mailbox today Sweet!  I was beginning to think Greenpeace realized they messed up.  Looking forward to getting mine!

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: Markzellers on June 06, 2023, 02:14:39 PMQuote from: BTCOVERFIATS on June 06, 2023, 01:36:17 AMAfter a couple months of waiting, I just received my sticker in my mailbox today Sweet!  I was beginning to think Greenpeace realized they messed up.  Looking forward to getting mine!Ya, I had totally forgotten about this. I signed up to have a couple of them sent to me. Not sure what I’ll do with them, but it’s funny to think about all the resources this dumbass campaign wasted just to get Bitcoiners some stickers they will be proud of because the campaign was done so poorly. With this type of idiocy, I’m surprised Greenpeace isn’t a government entity.

comments.author: aoluain
comments.body: It looks like that link is not working anymore....QuoteSorry, the page you are trying to access is not accepting submissions at this time.Hopefully a good percentage of those stickers ended up in the hands of Bitcoiners . . .

comments.author: markinaz
comments.body: Quote from: aoluain on June 06, 2023, 05:50:51 PMIt looks like that link is not working anymore....QuoteSorry, the page you are trying to access is not accepting submissions at this time.Hopefully a good percentage of those stickers ended up in the hands of Bitcoiners . . .Well, I got 4!  I signed up with my wife, my nephews and myself...lol    Best of all, it cost Greenpeace 12.5 cents each in postage for this blunder.   This has to go down in history as their biggest mistake (overall, I support Greenpeace in most causes, this was completely misguided).

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Quote from: Markzellers on June 06, 2023, 10:00:16 PMWell, I got 4!  I signed up with my wife, my nephews and myself...lol    Best of all, it cost Greenpeace 12.5 cents each in postage for this blunder.   This has to go down in history as their biggest mistake (overall, I support Greenpeace in most causes, this was completely misguided).Yeah I think I maybe got one or 2 coming ... Offer is over/dead now tho...

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Received this envelope today which I thought was junk mail...and I usually dont bother opening at all....Until I held against the light and saw a round object....opened and it turned out to be the sticker! Forgot all about it and pleasantly surprised...

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: These stickers are going to be rare. I wonder how many people actually took advantage of their offer. Probably very little

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: krogothmanhattan on June 16, 2023, 09:04:57 AM  Received this envelope today which I thought was junk mail...and I usually dont bother opening at all....Until I held against the light and saw a round object....opened and it turned out to be the sticker! Forgot all about it and pleasantly surprised... Damn. I’m betting I threw mine out unless it hasn’t come yet. I got notification that one came to my post office box so I’ll have to be more careful combing through that mess of advertisements. I feel like advertising has ruined mail and telemarketers are trying their best to ruin phones being useful for calls. It’s also possible I don’t take mail or phone calls seriously enough. I do enjoy messing with telemarketers. Useless tidbit: As I was typing this in a lobby, someone named Craig Wright just came in. I did a double take.

comments.author: aoluain
comments.body: Quote from: BTCOVERFIATS on June 16, 2023, 01:31:16 PMThese stickers are going to be rare. I wonder how many people actually took advantage of their offer. Probably very little ...and how many of those didnt peel and stick them as they were intended?So no doubt these will come up again in an auction/raffle thread in the future herein the Collectibles board.

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Really cool looking stickers. Missed ordering some. :sGiven the fact they allow re-printing by yourself I wonder if there is a way to discern the original Greenpeace stickers from custom prints? See:Quote from: cygan on March 25, 2023, 11:56:47 AMthis sticker edition you can print out with the file below or use this file e.g. at stickermule.com to be able to order this there!https://bitcoinis.green/stickers
